import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; const AppointmentSection = () => { const [currentPostIndex, setCurrentPostIndex] = useState(0); const instagramPosts = [ { id: 1, image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1560066984-138dadb4c035?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=400&q=80", caption: "Fresh cut and style ‚ú® #PrissySalon #HairGoals", likes: "2.3k", username: "prissysalon" }, { id: 2, image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1522337360788-8b13dee7a37e?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=400&q=80", caption: "Beautiful makeup transformation üíÑ #MakeupArtistry #Beauty", likes: "1.8k", username: "prissysalon" }, { id: 3, image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1516975080664-ed2fc6a32937?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=400&q=80", caption: "Perfect nail art for the weekend üíÖ #NailArt #Manicure", likes: "3.1k", username: "prissysalon" }, { id: 4, image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1570172619644-dfd03ed5d881?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=400&q=80", caption: "Glowing skin after our facial treatment ‚ú® #Facial #Skincare", likes: "2.7k", username: "prissysalon" } ]; useEffect(() => { const interval = setInterval(() => { setCurrentPostIndex((prevIndex) => prevIndex === instagramPosts.length - 1 ? 0 : prevIndex + 1 ); }, 4000); // Change post every 4 seconds return () => clearInterval(interval); }, [instagramPosts.length]); return (
